data.title: Working in American Theatre: A brief history, career guide and resource book for over 1,000 theatres 9781408134733, 9781350054790, 9781408152324
data.meta_description: “I cannot think of a better book for aspiring and working actors, craftspeople, artists, and managers” Kent Thompson, Ar...
